document_data.mainbody:
Old Flake-Eyes was a hunter ranger thug who opposed the Guild crime gang of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Old Flake-Eyes was a dragonborn whose scale coloration betrayed their copper dragon ancestry. The ranger wore a set of leather armor and handled a bow.
As a copper dragonborn, Old Flake-Eyes could breathe out a puff of acid and as an experienced ranger, had access to several spells.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Farlin led a gang of Guild members in dealing with the Stone Lord and his men. The new kingpin secretly served the Absolute and was trying to remove the Guilds influence from across the Gate. Farlins group faced a band of the Stone Lords men led by the tiefling Cairos, including Old Flake-Eyes. They clashed under the Wyrms Crossing bridge in Rivington over a shipment of supplies. However, the meeting devolved into a battle and either squads fates remained uncertain.
